text: Per Aage Brandt (26 April 1944 – 11 November 2021) was a Danish writer, poet, translator, linguist and musician. He was born in Buenos Aires. Brandt published a large number of books about linguistics, culture, and music as well as poetry. His career began in 1969. He translated the works of Molière and Marquis de Sade.
